message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  To find a mutually agreeable point, I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,800,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
